content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(y=-80.0) connected to burner-inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner-inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)
-  Another furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam-engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Connected to pipe-group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe-group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt-group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them, as seen with burner-mining-drill, burner-inserter, and boiler entities.
### Errors when using entities that require ingredients
-  Ensure that entities that require ingredients have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them, as seen with stone-furnace entity.
### Errors when using entities that require connection to electric network
-  Ensure that entities that require connection to electric network are properly connected, as seen with steam-engine entity.
### Errors when using pipe-group entities
-  Ensure that pipe-group entities are not empty and have a full output, as seen with pipe-group entities.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
